But <S%H3089>Jehosheba,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3141>Joram,<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3060>Joash<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> and <S%H1589>stole<s%> him from <S%H8432>among<s%> the king's <S%H1121>sons<s%> who were being <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H5641>placed<s%> him and his <S%H3243>nurse<s%> in the <S%H2315>bedroom.<s%> <S%H4296><s%> So they <S%H5641>hid<s%> him from <S%H6271>Athaliah,<s%> and he was not <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

So he was <S%H2244>hidden<s%> with her in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> while <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> was <S%H4427>reigning<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>brought<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> of the <S%H3746>Carites<s%> and of the <S%H7323>guard,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to him in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Then he <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them and <S%H7650>put<s%> them <S%H7650>under<s%> <S%H7650>oath<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the king's <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do:<s%> one <S%H7992>third<s%> of you, who <S%H935>come<s%> in on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>watch<s%> over the king's <S%H1004>house<s%>

(one <S%H7992>third<s%> also [shall be] at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H5495>Sur,<s%> and one <S%H7992>third<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7323>guards<s%>), shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>watch<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H4535>defense.<s%>

"And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>parts<s%> of you, [even] <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3318>go<s%> out on the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> shall also <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>watch<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H5362>surround<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> with his weapons in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and whoever <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H413>within<s%> the <S%H7713>ranks<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%> And be with the <S%H4428>king<s%> when he <S%H3318>goes<s%> out and when he <S%H935>comes<s%> in."

So the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%> And <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of them <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H376>men<s%> who were to <S%H935>come<s%> in on the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> with those who were to <S%H3318>go<s%> out on the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> the <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H7982>shields<s%> that had been <S%H4428>King<s%> David's, <S%H834>which<s%> [were] in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H7323>guards<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> with his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> from the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and by the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then he <S%H3318>brought<s%> the <S%H4427>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> out and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5145>crown<s%> on him, and [gave him] the <S%H5715>testimony;<s%> and they <S%H4427>made<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him, and they <S%H5221>clapped<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "[Long] <S%H2421>live<s%> the king!"

When <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7323>guard<s%> [and of] the <S%H5971>people,<s%> she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And she <S%H7200>looked<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>custom,<s%> with the <S%H8269>captains<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpeters<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> the <S%H4428>king;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8056>rejoiced<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%> Then <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> her <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> <S%H7195>"Treason!<s%> <S%H7195>Treason!<s%>"

So they <S%H7760>seized<s%> <S%H3027><s%> her, and when she <S%H935>arrived<s%> at the horses' <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of the king's <S%H1004>house,<s%> she was <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they should be the Lord's <S%H5971>people,<s%> also <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H5422>tore<s%> it <S%H5422>down;<s%> his <S%H4196>altars<s%> and his <S%H6754>images<s%> they <S%H7665>broke<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> <S%H3190>thoroughly,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H4977>Mattan<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altars.<s%> And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> <S%H6486>officers<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> and the <S%H3746>Carites<s%> and the <S%H7323>guards<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> and they <S%H3381>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H7323>guards<s%> to the king's <S%H1004>house.<s%> And he <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H8252>quiet.<s%> For they had <S%H4191>put<s%> <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> at the king's <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>
